PROFILE_FORM_INTRO_MESSAGE: Please provide your information below to ensure an accurate health measurement.
PROFILE_FORM_BLOOD_PRESSURE_LABEL: Are you on blood pressure medication?
PROFILE_FORM_VALIDATION_HEIGHT_METRIC: Height must be between 120 and 220 cm
PROFILE_FORM_VALIDATION_WEIGHT_METRIC: Weight must be between 30 and 300 kg
PROFILE_FORM_VALIDATION_WEIGHT_IMPERIAL: Weight must be between 66 and 661 lbs
PROFILE_FORM_VALIDATION_AGE: Age must be between 13 and 120 years
PROFILE_FORM_VALIDATION_BMI: BMI must be between 10 and 65 for an accurate measurement
KIOSK_HELP_CAMERA: Face the camera and keep your face within the circle throughout the measurement.
KIOSK_HELP_ACCESSORIES: Remove any accessories such as glasses or hats, and any facial makeup, before starting the measurement.
KIOSK_HELP_STAY: Once the measurement begins, remain still and in position for 30 seconds until it is complete.
RESULTS_PROCESSING_ERROR: We encountered an issue while processing your results. Please review the guidelines and try again.
